text: Jodi kunba manu kotha kore, tai laga kotha to Isor laga kotha he hobole dibi. Jodi kunba sewa kore, Isor pora diya takot te he kori bole dibi. Eitu khan koribi aru etu sob kaam te Jisu Khrista dwara Isor laga mohima hobo. Jisu Khrista laga naam te mohima aru takot hodai nimite hobole dibi. Amen.
